languages.text: "Кто бы знал! Я всю жизнь прожил в нижнем городе, лишь раз дневной свет видел, а потому тоски по нему не испытываю. А вот холод... Холод стал настоящей погибелью. Только в глубине улья еще есть тепло — там-то мы и спасаемся... Спасались, до недавних пор. Пока из центрального столба все тепло не ушло. Как ушло — мы с ребятами поднялися наверх, дабы отыскать припасы и помощь... И нашли вас!"

traits.locale_text: "Кто бы знал! Я всю жизнь прожил в нижнем городе, лишь раз дневной свет видел, а потому тоски по нему не испытываю. А вот холод... Холод стал настоящей погибелью. Только в глубине улья еще есть тепло — там-то мы и спасаемся... Спасались, до недавних пор. Пока из центрального столба все тепло не ушло. Как ушло — мы с ребятами поднялися наверх, дабы отыскать припасы и помощь... И нашли вас!"
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"
languages.original_text: "Кто бы знал! Я всю жизнь прожил в нижнем городе, лишь раз дневной свет видел, а потому тоски по нему не испытываю. А вот холод... Холод стал настоящей погибелью. Только в глубине улья еще есть тепло — там-то мы и спасаемся... Спасались, до недавних пор. Пока из центрального столба все тепло не ушло. Как ушло — мы с ребятами поднялися наверх, дабы отыскать припасы и помощь... И нашли вас!"

traits.locale_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "If only someone knew! I spent my entire life in the underhive, saw daylight only once and am not missing it much. But the cold... It is the cold that became our bane. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering. I went to the spire of Ascension to get help and bring back supplies... And found you!"
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: “要是有人知道就好了！我这辈子都在巢都底层度过，我只见过一次太阳，所以我也不怎么怀念它。不过，寒冷……寒冷真的是我们的天敌。巢都底层之前依然还有些暖意，我们也在那里勉强度日……呃，确切地说，那已经是不久前的事情了。在那之后，中央支柱所有热量都耗尽了。于是我和其他人跑到上面寻求救援，找到了物资……还发现了你！”
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: “要是有人知道就好了！我这辈子都在巢都底层度过，我只见过一次太阳，所以我也不怎么怀念它。不过，寒冷……寒冷真的是我们的天敌。巢都底层之前依然还有些暖意，我们也在那里勉强度日……呃，确切地说，那已经是不久前的事情了。在那之后，中央支柱所有热量都耗尽了。于是我和其他人跑到上面寻求救援，找到了物资……还发现了你！”
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: «¡Si alguien lo hubiera sabido! Me he pasado todo la vida en las profundidades de la colmena. Solo he visto la luz del sol una vez, así que no es que la eche de menos. Pero el frío... Es el frío lo que nos ha condenado. Aún queda calor en lo más profundo de la colmena, es donde nos refugiamos. Bueno, hasta hace poco. Hasta que el pilar central perdió todo su calor. En ese momento, los demás y yo vinimos a por ayuda y suministros... ¡y nos encontramos con usted!».
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Si alguien lo hubiera sabido! Me he pasado todo la vida en las profundidades de la colmena. Solo he visto la luz del sol una vez, así que no es que la eche de menos. Pero el frío... Es el frío lo que nos ha condenado. Aún queda calor en lo más profundo de la colmena, es donde nos refugiamos. Bueno, hasta hace poco. Hasta que el pilar central perdió todo su calor. En ese momento, los demás y yo vinimos a por ayuda y suministros... ¡y nos encontramos con usted!».
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: 「そのことを知っていれば…！私は生まれてからずっとアンダーハイヴで過ごしてきました…昼の光を見たのも一度きりなので、それほど恋しくありません。でも寒さは…我々を破滅へと導きました。熱はまだハイヴの奥の方に残っていて…そこで身を寄せ合い…あぁ、最近までの話です。中央柱の熱が全てなくなるまではそうしていました。熱がなくなって、私と他の者で助けを呼び、物資を持ち帰ろうと出かけました…そしてあなたに出会ったんです！」
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: 「そのことを知っていれば…！私は生まれてからずっとアンダーハイヴで過ごしてきました…昼の光を見たのも一度きりなので、それほど恋しくありません。でも寒さは…我々を破滅へと導きました。熱はまだハイヴの奥の方に残っていて…そこで身を寄せ合い…あぁ、最近までの話です。中央柱の熱が全てなくなるまではそうしていました。熱がなくなって、私と他の者で助けを呼び、物資を持ち帰ろうと出かけました…そしてあなたに出会ったんです！」
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "Wenn das nur jemand wüsste! Ich habe mein gesamtes Leben im Underhive verbracht – und nur ein einziges Mal Tageslicht gesehen, deswegen vermisse ich es auch kaum. Aber die Kälte ... die Kälte war unser Untergang. Die Wärme ist in den Tiefen der Makropole noch präsent – dort leben wir ... Das heißt, bis vor Kurzem haben wir dort gelebt. Bis die gesamte Wärme die zentrale Säule verließ. Ich und die anderen kamen dann nach oben, um Hilfe zu holen und Vorräte zu beschaffen ... und fanden Euch!"
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das nur jemand wüsste! Ich habe mein gesamtes Leben im Underhive verbracht – und nur ein einziges Mal Tageslicht gesehen, deswegen vermisse ich es auch kaum. Aber die Kälte ... die Kälte war unser Untergang. Die Wärme ist in den Tiefen der Makropole noch präsent – dort leben wir ... Das heißt, bis vor Kurzem haben wir dort gelebt. Bis die gesamte Wärme die zentrale Säule verließ. Ich und die anderen kamen dann nach oben, um Hilfe zu holen und Vorräte zu beschaffen ... und fanden Euch!"
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: « Ça, j'aimerais bien le savoir ! J'ai passé ma vie entière dans la sous-ruche, et comme je n'ai vu la lumière du jour qu'une seule fois, on ne peut pas dire qu'elle me manque beaucoup. Le froid, en revanche... C'est lui qui a scellé notre perte. Il fait encore bon dans les profondeurs de la ruche, là où on s'était réfugiés... Mais on a dû décamper récemment, quand toute cette chaleur s'est échappée du pilier central. On est remontés pour chercher de l'aide et rapporter des provisions... et c'est là qu'on vous a {mf|rencontré|rencontrée} ! »
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça, j'aimerais bien le savoir ! J'ai passé ma vie entière dans la sous-ruche, et comme je n'ai vu la lumière du jour qu'une seule fois, on ne peut pas dire qu'elle me manque beaucoup. Le froid, en revanche... C'est lui qui a scellé notre perte. Il fait encore bon dans les profondeurs de la ruche, là où on s'était réfugiés... Mais on a dû décamper récemment, quand toute cette chaleur s'est échappée du pilier central. On est remontés pour chercher de l'aide et rapporter des provisions... et c'est là qu'on vous a {mf|rencontré|rencontrée} ! »
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "Bir bilsek! Tüm hayatımı kovanaltında geçirdim. Güneşi bile bir kerecik gördüm, artık özlemiyorum. Fakat soğuk... Bizim felaketimiz o oldu. Kovanın derinliklerinde hâlâ ısı var, hepimiz oraya doluştuk. Yakın zamana kadar öyleydi yani. Sonra tüm ısı, ana kolondan dışarı çıktı... Ben ve dostlarım yardım bulmak ve erzak taşımak için yukarı çıktık... Sizi bulduk!"
languages.original_text: "If only someone knew! I've spent my entire life in the underhive — I only ever saw daylight once, so I'm not missing it much now. But the cold... It's the cold that was our undoing. The heat still lingers in the depths of the hive — that's where we are sheltering... Well, we were until recently. Until all the heat escaped the central pillar. When it did, myself and the others came up to get help and bring back supplies... and found you!"

traits.locale_text: "Keşke bilseydik! Tüm hayatımı Kovanaltı'nda geçirdim. Güneşi bile bir kerecik gördüm, artık özlemiyorum. Fakat soğuk... Bizim felaketimiz bu soğuktu. Kovanın derinliklerinde hâlâ biraz ısı var, hepimiz oraya doluştuk. Yakın zamana kadar öyleydi yani. Tüm ısı, ana kolondan dışarı çıkana kadar... Sonra ben ve dostlarım yardım bulmak ve erzak taşımak için yukarı çıktık... Ve sizi bulduk!"
traits.speaker: Scout
